column1: Table 1-55:  U.S.-Mexican Border Land-Freight Gateways: Number of Incoming Truck and Train Crossings
Data do not include privately owned pickup trucks.

U.S. Department of Transportation, Bureau of Transportation Statistics, Border Crossing/Entry Data, available at http://transborder.bts.gov/programs/international/transborder/TBDR_BC/TBDR_BC_Index.html as of July 15, 2016.
